title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation for the confinement of popish recusants within five miles of their respective dwellings
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the seventeenth day of June,  1690. In the second year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
